about_the_game:
In 2036, a tiny organism is born into a world overflowing with garbage and inhospitable to life due to environmental pollution. This small creature faces the dark reality of environmental pollution in this world covered with garbage. However, when it finds a photograph of a beautiful landscape, it begins to dream of a different reality. The creature embarks on a long journey to find a clean environment that it hopes might still exist somewhere.

- Escape from a world ravaged by environmental pollution and find a beautiful place.
- Avoid obstacles made up of garbage and waste left by people.

- Use objects bigger than the small creature to solve puzzles and escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
